page1.title: Convergence
page1.desc: Finally, let's see how the composition of contributors will change as time evolves...
page1.s1d: Every once in a while, conduct a workload poll.
page1.s2d: Eliminate 5 personnel with the lowest type of input-output yield
page1.s3d: Add 5 personnel of the highest input-output yield type

page2.p1: We'll start the "Vote-Out-Increase" trilogy right away,
page2.p2: and then repeat it almost a dozen times...

page3.p3: Although in the short term, the greedy ghost will stay in the team for a while, eventually we see that when he is punished, he will become restrained and the team will gradually reach a consensus and become a kind of person.
